channel.title: Mac on Sriram S - Innervoice
channel.description: Recent content in Mac on Sriram S - Innervoice

item.title: Using MAC table – Linux Bridge – WILT
item.description: In an earlier blog, I have talked about Linux bridge based virtual networking. Recently as part of a comment on my blog, I learnt how to view and interpret the MAC table of Linux bridge. In this installment of WILT (What I Learnt Today) series, I will share how MAC Table can be used for troubleshooting Linux bridges.

item.title: Networking Nuggets – Hub vs Bridge vs Switch
item.description: Here is an overview of three basic networking devices – Hub, Bridge and a Switch. This blog and the related YouTube video will be useful for upcoming topics related to virtual networking such as Linux Bridge and Open vSwitch.
